section.title: Disable FTP (vsftpd)
section.para:
Disables vsftpd, which is a FTP server. FTP is an unencrypted protocol and should be replaced with SSH-based file-transfer mechanisms such as scp(1) and sftp(1) when possible. FTP
vsftpd
Replacing FTP with SSH file transfer mechanisms is strongly recommended.

row.entry: Not part of the standard Solaris distribution.
